title: The Censure of the Rota upon Mr Miltons book, entituled, The ready and easie way to establish a free common-wealth die lun√¶ 26, Martij, 1660 / ordered by the Rota that M. Harrington be desired to draw up a narrative of this dayes proceeding upon Mr. Miltons book, called, The ready and easie way, &c., and to cause the same to be forthwith printed and pu[b]lished, and a copy thereof to be sent to Mr. Milton, Trundle Wheeler, Clerk to the Rota.
author: Harrington, James, 1611-1677.
